newsitem.title: CHINA: China warns U.S. on U.N. rights resolution.
newsitem.headline: China warns U.S. on U.N. rights resolution.

text.p: China warned the United States on Thursday that relations could suffer if it continued to support Denmark's decision to censure China's human rights record in the United Nations.
However, the biggest loser would be Denmark, Foreign Ministry spokesman Shen Guofang told a news briefing.
"Sino-U.S. relations have already seen improvements, but the U.S. support of Denmark will, of course, damage bilateral relations," Shen said.
"The U.S. government should resolve this problem from the basis of bilateral relations," he said.
He repeated warnings that Denmark's decision to press ahead with United Nations criticism of China's human rights policies would damage ties.
"Denmark should consider its national interests and consider seriously the consequences," Shen said.
